description:
In this course, you will be learning how to install Ubuntu Server 12.04 and installing FreeSWITCH on top of Ubuntu. You will then be taught on the following:

  • Creating an extension number
  • Registering your SIP provider
  • Inbound Dialplan
  • Outbound Dialplan
  • Simple IVR system
title: Installing and Setting up FreeSWITCH: Basics
